UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: HEXIM1 Peptide Exhibits Antimicrobial Activity Against Antibiotic Resistant Bacteria Through Guidance of Cell Penetrating Peptide.
Literature.Author: Ho PL, Ong HK, Teo JW, Ow DS, Chao SH

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:5% Killing=50 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:80% Killing=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MBC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2523(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2523(MBC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis VR(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis VR(MBC=16µM)
